author: Staff Reporter
text:
A TNSTC bus driver was allegedly assaulted by a man near the toll plaza at Athupalam near Ukkadam on Saturday.

According to police, the bus (route number 47-A) hit a a two-wheeler at Athupalam.

Though the two-wheeler rider M. Ashiq Ali (22) and pillion rider B. Nizarudin (27) were not injured, they stopped the vehicle and and entered into argument with the driver. Nizarudin had reportedly attacked the driver.
title: TNSTC bus driver assaulted
